description:
We are currently interviewing for a Junior Account Manager to join our team! We are looking for an individual who is hard working and dedicated to growing into a Management Role with our company. As a Junior Account Manager you would focus on the following:

  • Development of marketing campaigns and strategies, customer service and client acquisition, and implementation of product launches
  • Rigorous leadership training, & promotional advertising

We provide full one-on-one training in customer relations, brand name recognition, acquisition, and management training through direct marketing. You must be goal-oriented, possess a strong work ethic, and have a friendly demeanor. We promote a very positive and friendly work environment, so all potential candidates must be constructive and career-driven individuals!

Junior Level Account Manager Requirements:

  • Work experience in the following industries is an asset, but not required: Communications, Business administration, Management, Advertising, Marketing, Public Relations, Political Science, Psychology, Sports Management, and related fields
  • Willingness to succeed and train in an entry-level promotions position
  • Great communication skills and people skills
  • Excellent work ethic
  • A positive business attitude like the rest of our client’s enthusiastic staff
  • You must be confident you'll be successful, just waiting for a career opportunity where you can prove yourself

***Guaranteed training is provided to all entry-level positions***

This position requires the candidate to reliably commute to the office daily, and be able to start within 2 weeks of being offered the position.
